title: How Do Our Brains Process Stories?: 'BrainsOn!' Has Some Answers!
dc:creator: WBUR
description: How do our brains process the stories we hear? What happens when we are introduced to new characters? Our friends from the podcast "Brains On!" help us figure it out!
